== Lists

.Unordered, basic

* Bill Bryson

* level 1

* level 1

.Checklist
- [*] checked
- [x] also checked
- [ ] not checked
-     normal list item

.Unordered, complex
* level 1
** level 2
*** level 3
This is a new line inside an unordered list using {plus} symbol.
We can even force content to start on a separate line... +
Amazing, isn't it?
**** level 4
+
The {plus} symbol is on a new line.

***** level 5
